author: bridge-bot
content:
<nicoserranop> I got the double signing working in the frontend :D we just need to past the review and it would be merged and available at https://ceremony.ethereum.org/

I opened a PR in the sequencer code with a couple of functions I used to:

1. get potPubkeys
2. subgroup checks after contribution

Could you take a look https://github.com/ethereum/kzg-ceremony-sequencer/pull/116 ? :)

author: stefanbratanov
content: Hi, got a question about the sequencer. I am calling `try_contribute` and get `TryContributeError::AnotherContributionInProgress`  Then, I am waiting 5 seconds to try again, but keep getting `TryContributeError::RateLimited` How many seconds is the minimum between `try_contribute` calls without getting rate limit errors? Couldn't see this in the spec
